ovdesc.p: This table is used to parameterize additional details of the company, @ID should be a valid Company code

desc.p: This field is used to specify the Tax ID of the branch or lead company.
This field is used to specify the company's city of incorporation.
This field is used to specify the company's county of incorporation.
This field is used to specify the company's state of incorporation.
This field is used to specify the ZIP code of the company's address.
This field is used to specify the ZIP code of the company's address.
This field is used to specify the company's date of incorporation.
This field is used to parameterize the NAICS code.
This field is used to define the FAX number of the company.
Numeric 1-10 digits, Consist of 3 digit area code and 7 digit FAX number.
